title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2164.6 - Proposed project(s) or program financing and leveraging plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2164.6 - Proposed project(s) or program financing and leveraging plan

State Regulations
(a) Identification
of all private investments and/or commitments and all other public assistance
that will be necessary and available to make the project possible, including
amounts and uses of each. (b) The
amount of payments, grants or loans necessary to make the project
feasible. (c) The leveraging ratio
resulting from the combination of available funds. (d) In the event that the assistance to be
provided by the eligible applicant to the recipient(s) is in the form of a
loan, the term, rate of interest and conditions for repayment of the
loan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2164.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
